title: 82/886/EEC: Council Decision of 13 December 1982 concerning the conclusion of the Convention for the Conservation of Salmon in the North Atlantic Oceani
header:
31.12.1982 EN Official Journal of the European Communities L 378/24
COUNCIL DECISION
of 13 December 1982
concerning the conclusion of the Convention for the Conservation of Salmon in the North Atlantic Ocean
(82/886/EEC)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The Convention for the Conservation of Salmon in the North Atlantic Ocean is hereby approved on behalf of the European Economic Community.
The text of the Convention is attached to this Decision.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 13 December 1982.
For the Council
The President
N. A. KOFOED
(1)  OJ No C 238, 13. 9. 1982, p. 106.
